page.title: 17WASHINGTON STREET GAMES
page.content: In one of Washington's streets we play a game called 'British Bulldog'.It is played with more than two people.One person 'on',that person stands in the middle of the road the other people stand at one side of the road.The other person that is 'on' calls a name of someone playing the game.The person who is picked says "British Bulldog" and everyone runs across the road without being touched by the person who is 'on'.When a person is touched they are 'on'with the other person until everyone has been touched.When everyone is touched the person who was touched first is 'on'.After it is all finished the game is played over again.
